function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for virus propagation within residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and reduced public health","Mitigation":"Use of touchless and automated technologies, innovative surface materials, and increased green spaces","Technologies":"Touchless and automated technologies, innovative surface materials, communication technologies, and smart innovations","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners"},{"Description":"Reduced environmental outcomes due to waste generation and reduced recycling","Impact":"Negative impact on the environment and sustainability","Mitigation":"Improved waste management and recycling protocols","Technologies":"Waste management technologies, recycling technologies","People":"General public, waste management authorities","Owner":"Government, waste management authorities"},{"Description":"Dependence of human health on the quality of residential buildings","Impact":"Risk to public health and social well-being","Mitigation":"Incorporation of health, comfort, and safety considerations in residential building design","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, environmental control technologies","People":"Residents, public health authorities","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners"}]}
